model.map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.map.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.util.Observable
    This is the class that includes most logic functions for map It includes the functions like : 1. The functions of data changes for Continents, countries, and players of the whole map. 2. The finding, and loading functions of the map file 3. The checking functions for checking the string properties of the map file is suitable to the program or not
    Author:
    Yann Kerichard, Yueshuai Jiang, Che-Shao Chen

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String mapFilePath)
          throws java.io.IOException
        The method for loading the map file and checking the syntax of the map file is suit to the program or not
        Parameters:
        mapFilePath - The file path of the map file in string type
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - reject an error

      • loadMapSection

        private void loadMapSection(java.io.LineNumberReader in)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        * To load and check if the map file has the good syntax.
        Parameters:
        in - The string type in the map file that need to be read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - reject an error

                     throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        in - The continent string type in the map file that need to be read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - reject an error

      • loadCountries

        private void loadCountries(java.io.LineNumberReader in)
                    throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        in - The country string type in the map file that need to be read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - reject an error

      • findCountry

        private Country findCountry(java.lang.String name)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        The method is to find the specific country and its information
        Parameters:
        name - The specific country name in string type
        Returns:
        Returning to the current country in country type if the condition is correct, otherwise print incorrect map file with the current country name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - reject an error

      • parseCountryLine

        private void parseCountryLine(java.lang.String line)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        The method is to parse the neighbors of the current country with separated by ",". It also will check some conditions like the current country is exist or not and the correctness of the coordinates (x,y)
        Parameters:
        line - This is the string line of neighbors of the current country
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - reject an error

      • findContinent

        private Continent findContinent(java.lang.String name)
        The method is to find the specific continent and its information
        Parameters:
        name - The specific country name in string type
        Returns:
        Returning to the current continent in continent type if the condition is correct, otherwise returning null

      • reachSection

        private int reachSection(java.io.LineNumberReader in,
                         java.lang.String section)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        The method is to make a pointer for the LineNumberReader to point the target section in the map file
        Parameters:
        in - The string line number that need to be read
        section - The part of the string in the map file that is selected as the target
        Returns:
        Returning the LineNumberReader type "in" while the read file string is not equal to the head
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - reject an error

      • getPlayerNumber

        public int getPlayerNumber()
        The method is to get the current player number in the game
        Returns:
        Returning the current player number in the game

      • setPlayerNumber

        public void setPlayerNumber(int playerNumber)
        The method is to set the current player number in the game
        Parameters:
        playerNumber - The current total player number of the game with int type

      • setPlayers

        public void setPlayers(int playerNumber)
        The method is to set the current player number that selected by the user to the game It also contains the function to assign the initial armies for each player
        Parameters:
        playerNumber - The number of players that are selected with int type

      • getCardBonus

        public static int getCardBonus()
        Return card bonus and increase it by 5 each time a player receives this bonus
        Returns:
        the card bonus

      • getInitialArmiesNumber

        public int getInitialArmiesNumber()
        The method is to generate initial number of armies for each player when the game start It also includes the condition for different player number with different initial armies number for each player
        Returns:
        Returning different army number with different cases: case 2 with 40 army each player, case 3 with 35 army each player, case 4 with 30 army each player, case 5 with 25 army each player, case 6 with 20 army each player, others Return 0;

      • distributeCountries

        public void distributeCountries()
        The method of this function is to distribute the countries on the map between the players. It will deploy 1 army of each player as take turns until all the countries are owned by players

      • isOwned

        public boolean isOwned()
        The method is to check whether the country owned by the correct player. Returning false if the match is incorrect, and returning true if the match is correct.
        Returns:
        Returning false if the country is not owned by the correct owned player, otherwise returning true.

      • addArmiesToCountry

        public void addArmiesToCountry(Country c,
                               int armiesNumber)
        Add armies to a specific country by its id
        Parameters:
        c - Country id
        armiesNumber - Armies number to add

      • addArmiesFromHand

        public void addArmiesFromHand(int countryNumber,
                              int armiesNumber)
        Add armies to a country, and reduces the number of army in player's hand.
        Parameters:
        countryNumber - Country id.
        armiesNumber - Number of armies to add.

      • addArmiesFromHand

        public void addArmiesFromHand(Country c,
                              int armiesNumber)
        Add armies to a country, and reduces the number of army in player's hand.
        Parameters:
        c - The country that receives the armies.
        armiesNumber - Number of armies to add.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the country selected

      • calculateArmyNum

        public int calculateArmyNum(Player p)
        The method is to calculate the country number that the current player owned. It also calculate the number of deployable armies that the current player can get
        Parameters:
        p - The current player
        Returns:
        Returning the number of deployable armies that the current player left

      • wholeContinentBonus

        public int wholeContinentBonus(Player p)
        The method is to check whether the player can take over the whole continent
        Parameters:
        p - The current player
        Returns:
        Returning the number of extra armies that the player will get for owned the current continent
